alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Clinch; Coffee; Echols; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 20 at 9:04AM EST until January 22 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning tonight, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 expected. For the Freeze Watch Sunday night, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible. * WHERE...Coffee, Jeff Davis, Bacon, Appling, Wayne, Atkinson, Pierce, Echols, Clinch and Northern Ware Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning tonight, from 1 AM to 9 AM EST Sunday. For the Freeze Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Clinch; Coffee; Echols; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne
